00016 ChannelInterfaceManager::ChannelInterfaceManager(
00017         QSharedPointer<Component> component,
00018         void* dataPointer,
00019         QWidget *parent): 
00020 ListManager(tr("Bus interface references"), parent), 
00021 channel_(static_cast<Channel*>(dataPointer)),
00022 component_(component) {
00023

00025                 "Null Component-pointer given as parameter");

00033 void ChannelInterfaceManager::onAdd() {
00034         
00035         QString selected = ComboSelector::selectBusInterface(component_, this);
00036 
00037         // is user clicked cancel.
00038         if (selected.isEmpty())
00039                 return;
00040 
00041         model_.appendItem(selected);
00042 
00043         emit contentChanged();
00044 }
00045 
00046 void ChannelInterfaceManager::onEdit() {
00047         
00048         // ask the view for the selected index
00049         QModelIndex index = view_.currentIndex();
00050 
00051         // if index was invalid (nothing was chosen)
00052         if (!index.isValid()) {
00053                 return;
00054         }
00055 
00056         // get the old text that is currently stored in the model
00057         QString oldText = model_.data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00058 
00059         // ask the user to set the new text
00060         QString newText = ComboSelector::selectBusInterface(component_,
00061                 this, oldText);
00062 
00063         // if empty string was given or cancel was pressed
00064         if (newText.isEmpty()) {
00065                 return;
00066         }
00067 
00068         // if user changed the text
00069         else if (oldText != newText) {
00070                 model_.replace(index, newText);
00071 
00072                 // inform that content of the widget has changed
00073                 emit contentChanged();
00074         }
00075 }
00076 
00077 bool ChannelInterfaceManager::isValid() const {
00078         // atleast two interfaces must be specified.
00079         return (model_.rowCount() > 1);
00080 }
